content: Hello all. Great to be part of the discussion. Does anyone know of any good sandbox's that blockchain developers can use to play around with 'test/fake' Electronic Health Records? We wish to complete a proof of concept using blockchain and FHIR in early 2018.
Daniel, are you looking for normal FHIR Servers? See http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Publicly_Available_FHIR_Servers_for_testing
a good test data set is the last one SyntheticMass
In theory, at the IHE Conectathon will be a plug-thon where blockchain systems will be available. http://www.iheusa.org/blockchain-healthcare
That's a great start John, thank you. I'll let you know how we get on or if we have more questions.
